attributes.action: Stop the practice of air miles from surcharging passengers from regional airports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I want to fly from Bournemouth(say) which is 7 miles from my home to Dublin then Airmiles will charge me 1250 miles. If I travel to Gatwick, which is 120 miles from my home and then fly to Dublin they will charge me 750 miles,This encourages me to waste petrol and is not carbon helpful.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
